raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added region-specific Azure private networking domain requirements for EU, Australia, and Japan.
- Introduced new conceptual article "setup-types.md" explaining default vs. advanced code scanning setups.
- Updated code scanning configuration guides to reference the new setup types article.
- Created "dependabot-pull-request-comment-commands.md" reference for managing dependency updates.
- Moved "evaluating-default-setup-for-code-scanning.md" to tutorials section with updated title.
